verses.verse: Now the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> were <S%H3898>fighting<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> and <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H2491>slain<s%> on <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H1533>Gilboa.<s%>

And the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H1692>overtook<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons;<s%> and the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H5221>killed<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> and <S%H41>Abinadab<s%> and Malchi-shua the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul.<s%>

And the <S%H4421>battle<s%> <S%H3513>went<s%> <S%H3513>heavily<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> and the <S%H3384>archers<s%> <S%H376><s%> <S%H7198><s%> <S%H4672>hit<s%> him; and he was <S%H3966>badly<s%> <S%H9123>wounded<s%> by the <S%H3384>archers.<s%>

Then <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H3627>armor<s%> <S%H5375>bearer,<s%> <S%H8025>"Draw<s%> your <S%H2719>sword<s%> and <S%H1856>pierce<s%> me <S%H1856>through<s%> with it, <S%H6435>lest<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H1856>pierce<s%> me <S%H1856>through<s%> and <S%H9412>make<s%> <S%H9412>sport<s%> of me." But his <S%H3627>armor<s%> <S%H5375>bearer<s%> <S%H14>would<s%> not, for he was <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H3372>afraid.<s%> So <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> his <S%H2719>sword<s%> and <S%H5307>fell<s%> on it.

And when his <S%H3627>armor<s%> <S%H5375>bearer<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that <S%H7586>Saul<s%> was <S%H4191>dead,<s%> he <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> on his <S%H2719>sword<s%> and <S%H4191>died<s%> with him.

Thus <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> with his <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> his <S%H3627>armor<s%> <S%H5375>bearer,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H376>men<s%> on that <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H9191>together.<s%>

And when the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were on the <S%H5676>other<s%> <S%H5676>side<s%> of the <S%H6010>valley,<s%> with those <S%H834>who<s%> were <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H5127>fled<s%> and that <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> were <S%H4191>dead,<s%> they <S%H5800>abandoned<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> and <S%H5127>fled;<s%> then the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H3427>lived<s%> in them.

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about on the <S%H4283>next<s%> <S%H4283>day<s%> when the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H6584>strip<s%> the <S%H2491>slain,<s%> that they <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and his <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H5307>fallen<s%> on <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H1533>Gilboa.<s%>

And they <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> his <S%H7218>head,<s%> and <S%H6584>stripped<s%> <S%H6584>off<s%> his <S%H3627>weapons,<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> [them] <S%H5439>throughout<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> to <S%H1319>carry<s%> the good <S%H1319>news<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H6091>idols<s%> and to the <S%H5971>people.<s%>
And they <S%H7760>put<s%> his <S%H3627>weapons<s%> in the <S%H1004>temple<s%> of <S%H9441>Ashtaroth,<s%> and they <S%H8628>fastened<s%> his <S%H1472>body<s%> to the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of Beth-shan.
Now when the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of Jabesh-gilead <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul,<s%>

<S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H6965>rose<s%> and <S%H1980>walked<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3915>night,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H1472>body<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and the <S%H1472>bodies<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons<s%> from the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of Beth-shan, and they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3003>Jabesh,<s%> and <S%H8313>burned<s%> them <S%H8033>there.<s%>

And they <S%H3947>took<s%> their <S%H6106>bones<s%> and <S%H6912>buried<s%> them <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H815>tamarisk<s%> <S%H815>tree<s%> at <S%H3003>Jabesh,<s%> and <S%H6684>fasted<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>
